QuestData.Title: Residual Fallout
QuestData.Description: Pandaria is a mystical land, traveler.$b$bIt bears repeating that some of its secrets remain hidden, even to Lorewalkers.$b$bSealing those fissures did not mend what has been broken. If the legends are true, it will take much more to release this land from the grasp of the Sha.$b$bThe aggression of that battle awakened a host of living negative emotions. What you see here is likely the first of many such manifestations.$b$bFor now, we can only try to diminish their presence here.
QuestData.CompletionText: This, it seems, is only the tip of the iceberg, $n.
QuestData.RewardText: This is terrible...$b$bWe must find a way to undo what has been done here.
